title: Sleep differences of 10yo Malia and 60yo Anna Rosa

content.question: Malia is 10 years of age, and her grandmother, Anna Rosa, is 60 years old. Which statement is likely to be true concerning their sleep patterns?

choices.label: Anna Rosa is more likely than Malia to have night terrors.
Anna Rosa sleeps fewer hours per day than Malia does.
Anna Rosa spends more of her sleep time in deep sleep than Malia does.
Anna Rosa and Malia have the same sleep patterns.

content.answer: Anna Rosa sleeps fewer hours per day than Malia does.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
